2025-05-13.title: Microsoft to lay off about 3% of its workforce
2025-05-13.description: Microsoft says it is laying off nearly 3% of its entire workforce. The tech giant didn’t disclose the total amount of lost jobs but it will amount to about 6,000 people. Microsoft employed 228,000 full-time workers as of last June, the last time it reported i…

2025-05-13.description: As the Trump trade war clouds the economic outlook, software has dramatically outperformed this year relative to the rest of tech. Read on.

2025-05-15.title: Microsoft Signs Major Carbon-Removal Deal With Montag’s Rubicon
2025-05-15.description: Microsoft Corp. has agreed to finance the extraction of 18 million tons of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere, in what’s set to be one of the largest-ever purchases of carbon removal credits.
